title: Tech News: Gab gets Hacked and YouTube Copies TikTok
itunes:title: Tech News: Gab gets Hacked and YouTube Copies TikTok
description:
A hacker with a piratical handle hacked into Gab and stole 70 gigabytes of data. Meanwhile, China tests out a digital currency, Minneapolis backs off of an ill-advised plan to use influencers and YouTube decides to try and do TikTok only without as many editing tools.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
